item.title: Who to follow in Crypto?
item.description: This is my ever growing list of people to follow in the cryptosphere. I will continue to keep the list up to date and relevant. Who to follow on Twitter Pomp - @APompliano Mr. Anderson - @TrueCrypto28 The Crypto Dog - @TheCryptoDog Josh Rager - @Rager The Wolf Of All Streets - @scottmelker Rekt Capital - @rektcapital Koroush AK - @KoroushAK Newsletters The Pomp Letter Crypto Insights by Blockroots Youtube channels Anthony Pompliano
